title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 14 January 2009 - XWiki

(14/01/2009 14:23): XWiki.analuciafigueredo was modified by XWiki.analuciafigueredo (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/analuciafigueredo xwikibot - (14/01/2009 14:36): XWiki.VaidotasGreituolis was modified by XWiki.VaidotasGreituolis (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/VaidotasGreituolis maggo - (14/01/2009 14:53): hi@ all i try to update from XEM 1.4.1 to XEM 1.5 all seems to be ok but my LDAP authentication won't work and i get the followin error in my xwiki.log 14:49:12,543 [http://oewxwiki.oew.de:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Main/] [http-8080-1] DEBUG LDAP.XWikiLDAPAuthServiceImpl   - The provided user is null. We don't try to authenticate, it probably means the user is in non logged mode. vmassol - (14/01/2009 14:53): that's a good question for thomasmortagne  ;) thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 14:54): maggo: I doubt this has anything to do with this message, this log is because when you are not connected XWiki call the authenticator with null thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 14:55): and it's not an error ("DEBUG") thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 14:56): can you copy/paste the whole log in http://pastebin.com/ ? maggo - (14/01/2009 14:56): thomasmortagne: sure maggo - (14/01/2009 14:58): thomasmortagne: http://pastebin.com/m5ecd6e1f maggo - (14/01/2009 14:58): thomasmortagne: do you need my xwiki.cfg to? thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 14:59): maggo: I can't see the whole log, it stopped at "DEBUG LDAP.XWikiLDAPAuthServiceImpl   - LDAP authentication failed for user [mw]", I think you whould have more thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 14:59): yes it could help thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 14:59): anyway : LDAP authentication failed: LDAP not activ thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 14:59): this is your problem thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 14:59): I think thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 15:00): is ldap enabled ? thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 15:00): in xwiki.cfg ? thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 15:00): or maybe you disabled it in XWikiPreferences thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 15:01): but this is not new so it should not be because of the migration from 1.4.1 to 1.5, maybe a wrong xwiki.cfg merging maggo - (14/01/2009 15:01):  thomasmortagne: here is the xwiki.cfg http://pastebin.com/m15891b5b thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 15:02): wiki.authentication.ldap=1, it's xwiki.authentication.ldap=1 thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 15:02): was close ;) thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 15:02): maggo: I guess you did the migration of the cfg file too quickly maggo - (14/01/2009 15:07): thomasmortagne: sorry i don't understand it's exact the same in the file you wrote? maggo - (14/01/2009 15:08): thomasmortagne\_: oh sorry x is missing xwikibot - (14/01/2009 15:08): Design.NewAuthenticationArchitecture was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewAuthenticationArchitecture xwikibot - (14/01/2009 15:08): Design.NewAuthenticationArchitecture was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewAuthenticationArchitecture xwikibot - (14/01/2009 15:11): Design.NewAuthenticationArchitecture was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewAuthenticationArchitecture xwikibot - (14/01/2009 15:12): Design.NewAuthenticationArchitecture was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewAuthenticationArchitecture xwikibot - (14/01/2009 15:13): Design.NewAuthenticationArchitecture was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewAuthenticationArchitecture xwikibot - (14/01/2009 15:16): Design.NewAuthenticationArchitecture was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewAuthenticationArchitecture maggo - (14/01/2009 15:19): thomasmortagne: thanks for looking with 4 eyes i'm blind \*g\* greate work xwiki team! thomasmortagne - (14/01/2009 15:20): maggo: no problem :) xwikibot - (14/01/2009 15:44): XWiki.leo was modified by XWiki.leo (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/leo
